import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './styles/About.css'; import headshot from "../components/assets/images/daphneheadshot.png"; import portlandImage from "../components/assets/images/about/portland.jpg"; // Replace with your Portland image path import dogImage from "../components/assets/images/about/dog.jpg"; // Replace with your dog image path import ucsdLogo from "../components/assets/images/about/ucsd.jpg"; // Replace with UCSD logo path import hiking from "../components/assets/images/about/hiking.jpeg" import surf from "../components/assets/images/about/surf.jpeg" import rafting from "../components/assets/images/about/rafting.JPG" import tennis from "../components/assets/images/about/tennis.JPG" import pottery from "../components/assets/images/about/pottery.HEIC" const About = () => { const [hover, setHover] = useState(false); return (
{/* About Me Header */}
{/* Photo Section */}

hi, i'm daphne.

I'm a passionate designer and developer creating beautiful, functional digital experiences. I believe in making digital products that don't just function, but inspire. Whether it's designing interfaces that feel intuitive or exploring AI to craft personalized experiences, my goal is to leave a lasting impact.

{/* About Me Body */}

Skills & Expertise

{[ { skill: 'UI/UX Design', description: 'Crafting intuitive and visually appealing interfaces.', }, { skill: 'Fullstack Development', description: 'Building scalable, user-focused applications.', }, { skill: 'AI Integration', description: 'Leveraging AI to enhance user experiences.', }, { skill: 'Visual Design & Branding', description: 'Developing cohesive brand identities.', }, ].map(({ skill, description }) => (

{skill}

{description}

))}
{/* My Background Section */}

Where I Came From

I grew up surrounded by art and technology, two passions that shaped who I am today. From experimenting with graphic design as a teenager to diving deep into full-stack development in college, my journey has been fueled by creativity and curiosity.

{/* Interactive Image Gallery */}
{/* Portland Image */}
Portland, Oregon
{/* Dog Image */}
My Dog
{/* UCSD Logo */}
UCSD
{/* tennis */}
UCSD
{/* hiking */}
UCSD
{/* rafting */}
UCSD
{/* surfing */}
UCSD
{/* pottery */}
UCSD
{/* Hobbies Section */}

My Hobbies & Interests

When I'm not designing or coding, you can find me exploring the outdoors, capturing moments through photography, or experimenting with new tech like AI. I believe in balancing work with fun, and I love staying curious and learning new things.

{/* Call to Action Button */}
); }; export default About;
